Scrapping meteorological (Synop) data from the Ogimet webpage

ogimet.Rd

Downloading hourly or daily (meteorological) data from the Synop stations available at https://www.ogimet.com/

ogimet(interval, date, coords = FALSE, station, precip_split = TRUE)

Arguments

interval

'daily' or 'hourly' dataset to retrieve - given as character
date

start and finish of date (e.g., date=c("2018-05-01","2018-07-01") ) - character or Date class object
coords

add geographical coordinates of the station (logical value TRUE or FALSE)
station

WMO ID of meteorological station(s). Character or numeric vector
precip_split

whether to split precipitation fields into 6/12/24h numeric fields (logical value TRUE (default) or FALSE); valid only to hourly time step

Examples

  # downloading data for Poznan-Lawica
  poznan <- ogimet(interval = "daily", date=c("2019-06-01","2019-07-08"), station = 12330, coords = TRUE, precip_split = TRUE )
#> [1] 12330
#> 2019 07 
#> 2019 06 
#> 2019 05 
  head(poznan)
